snippet: Poor medical care and delayed emergency treatments are blamed for at least seven immigrants’ deaths in detention centers....
abstract: Report from Human Rights Watch shows poor medical care contributed to at least seven immigrants' deaths while in federal detention between 2012 and 2015.

byline.original: By MEGAN JULA and JULIA PRESTON

lead_paragraph: Poor medical care and delayed emergency treatments are blamed for at least seven immigrants’ deaths in detention centers.

headline.main: Delayed Care Faulted in Immigrants’ Deaths at Detention Centers
headline.print_headline: Delayed Care Blamed in Detention Center Deaths
